skills.title: Back-End
skills.description: I have experience building backend APIs for full-stack projects in languages such as Java, Python, and Javascript (Node.js)

skills.title: AI/Machine Learning
skills.description: Made machine learning models and neural networks to solve problems including diabetes detection using Python and libraries like Tensorflow

skills.title: Database Design
skills.description: Extensive experience in using SQL and MongoDB to manage databases and make complex queries including advanced aggregate calls

skills.title: Front-End
skills.description: I'm with industry-leading frameworks and technologies such as React, HTML/CSS, and Javascript to create responsive websites

portfolio.title: Diabetes Prediction (Machine Learning)
portfolio.description: Use classical machine learning algorithms to analyze and predict possibility of diabetes based on several factors (glucose levels, BMI, Age, etc.

portfolio.title: Plan My Day
portfolio.description: Utilize skills in android development and used industry standard Google Map API to create, plan, and optimize routes around LA. Select out of a list of locations and Plan My Day will plan a route and map it while taking into account of time and distance.

portfolio.title: Radiant Scheduler
portfolio.description: An advanced appointment scheduling tool for easily schedule appointments and viewed on a calender, tailored for special services. Created a detailed dashboard to show statistics and appointment data, including top services and appointment rates per month.

portfolio.title: Roomiez
portfolio.description: An roommate task scheduling board to create groups and assign tasks and chores for roommates to do. Utilized Java emailing services to send reminders
